effect.sun_moon: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.sun_moon: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
